Also about limits:
```using GLMakie
using AbstractPlotting

mytime  = Node(0.0)
lims    = lift(t -> FRect(t, 0, t+10, 10), mytime)
f(x, t) = sin.(x)
y       = lift(t -> f.(range(t, stop=10+t, length=50), t), mytime)
x       = lift(t -> range(t, stop = t+10, length=50), mytime)
figure, axis, plot = lines(x, y, limits = lims)

mytime[] = 10```
Does anyone know how to make the limits update?  I expected that, since they are `lift`'ed, that they would update :cry:

Thanks!  `lines(x, y, axis = (targetlimits = lims,))`  indeed makes the limits update.
I found that `autolimits!(axis)` gave good results, even better than me manually computing limits!
